Verses: 1 dhevanudaiya Naamamum Ubadhesamum Thooshikkappadaathapadikku, Adimaiththana Nugaththirkutpattirukkira Velaikkaarar Yaavarum Thangal Ejamaangalai Ellaak Ganaththirkum Paaththirarendru Ennikkollakkadavargal.

2 visuvaasigalaagiya Ejamaangalai Udaiyavargal, Thangal Ejamaangal Sagodhararaayirukkiradhinaale Avargalai Asattaipannaamal, Nalvelaiyin Balanaip Petrukollugira Avargal Visuvaasigalum Piriyarumaayirukkirapadiyaal, Avargalukku Adhigamaai Oozhiyanjseyyakkadavargal; Indhappadiye Podhiththup Buththisollu.
3 oruvan Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Aarokkiyamaana Vasanangalaiyum, Dhevabakdhikketra Ubadhesangalaiyum Oppukkollaamal, Vetrumaiyaana Ubadhesangalaip Podhikkiravanaanaal,

4 avan Irumaappullavanum, Ondrum Ariyaadhavanum, Tharkkangalaiyum Vaakkuvaadhangalaiyumpatri Noikondavanumaayirukkiraan; Avaigalaale Poraamaiyum, Sandaiyum, Thooshanangalum, Pollaadha Samsayangalumundaagi,

5 ketta Sindhaiyullavargalum Saththiyamillaadhavargalum Dhevabakdhiyai Aadhaayaththozhilendru Ennugiravargalumaayirukkira Manushargalaal Undaagum Maarubaadaana Tharkkangalum Pirakkum; Ippadippattavargalai Vittu Vilagu.
6 podhumengira Manadhudane Koodiya Dhevabakdhiye Migundha Aadhaayam.
7 ulagaththile Naam Ondrum Konduvandhadhumillai, Idhilirundhu Naam Ondrum Kondupovadhumillai Enbadhu Nichchayam.
8 unnavum Udukkavum Namakku Undaayirundhaal Adhu Podhumendrirukkakkadavom.
9 aisuvariyavaangalaaga Virumbugiravargal Sodhanaiyilum Kanniyilum, Manusharaik Kettilum Azhivilum Amizhththugira Madhikedum Sedhamumaana Palavidha Ichchaigalilum Vizhugiraargal.
10 pana Aasai Ellaath Theemaikkum Veraayirukkiradhu; Silar Adhai Ichchiththu, Visuvaasaththaivittu Vazhuvi, Anega Vedhanaigalaale Thangalai Uruvak Kuththikkondirukkiraargal.
11 neeyo, Dhevanudaiya Manushane Ivaigalai Vittodi, Needhiyaiyum Dhevabakdhiyaiyum Visuvaasaththaiyum Anbaiyum Porumaiyaiyum Saandhagunaththaiyum Adaiyumpadi Naadu.
12 visuvaasaththin Nalla Poraattaththaip Poraadu, Niththiyajeevanaip Patrikkol; Adharkaagave Nee Azhaikkappattaai; Anega Saatchigalukku Munbaaga Nalla Arikkai Panninavanumaayirukkiraai.
13 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhu Pirasannamaagumvaraikkum, Nee Indhak Karpanaiyai Maasillaamalum Kutramillaamalum Kaikkollumpadikku,

14 ellaavatraiyum Uyirodirukka Seygira Dhevanudaiya Sannidhaanaththileyum, Pondhiyupilaaththuvin Munnindru Nalla Arikkaiyai Saatchiyaaga Vilangappannina Kiristhu Yesuvinudaiya Sannidhaanaththileyum Unakkuk Kattalaiyidugiren.
15 andhap Pirasannamaagudhalai Dhevan Thammudaiya Kaalangalil Velippaduththuvaar, Avare Niththiyaanandhamulla Ega Sakkaraadhipadhiyum, Raajaadhi Raajaavum, Karththaadhi Karththaavum,

16 oruvaraai, Saavaamaiyullavarum, Serakkoodaatha Oliyil Vaasampannugiravarum, Manusharil Oruvarum Kandiraathavarum, Kaanakkoodaathavarumaayirukkiravar; Avarukke Ganamum Niththiya Vallamaiyum Undaayiruppadhaaga. Aamen.

17 ivvulagaththile Aisuvariyamullavargal Irumaappaana Sindhaiyullavargalaayiraamalum, Nilaiyatra Aisuvariyaththin Mel Nambikkai Vaiyaamalum, Naam Anubavikkiradharku Sagalavidha Nanmaigalaiyum Namakku Sambooranamaaik Kodukkira Jeevanulla Dhevanmel Nambikkai Vaikkavum,
18 nanmai Seyyavum, Narkiriyaigalil Aisuvariyavaangalaagavum, Dhaaraalamaaik Kodukkiravargalum, Udhaaragunamullavargalumaayirukkavum,
19 niththiya Jeevanaip Patrikkollumpadi Varungaalaththirkaagath Thangalukku Nalla Aadhaaraththaip Pokkishamaaga Vaikkavum Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyidu,
20 o Theemoththeyuve, Unnidaththil Oppuvikkappattadhai Nee Kaaththukkondu, Seerkedaana Veenpechchugalukkum, Gnaanamendru Poiyaaip Perpetrirukkira Kolgaiyin Vibareedhangalukkum Vilagu.
21 silar Adhaip Paaraatti, Visuvaasaththaivittu Vazhuvipponaargal. Kirubaiyaanadhu Unnodekooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
